name: KREM Radio
description: KREM Radio is Belize’s first private radio station. We operate from our studios in Belize City. KREM Radio has transmission facilities in the following localities:Belize City96.5 FMAnd in the Districts & Cayes91.1 FM & 101.1 FMwww.krembz.c

name: mood fm
description:
Belize's newest Oldies Station, playing the best selections!! Start your afternoon off with pure country hits from 4pm to 6pm with ICM, .

name: Reef Radio
description:
Reef Radio provides you with musical entertainment, also with ads and live coverage for special or emergency occasions.
	Show more

name: Radio Vision Belize
description: La radio es administrado por una directiva voluntario que vela por el buen manejo del ministerio.El ministerio camina por Fe y se sostiene a través de las ofrendas de hermanos, amigos, iglesias, negocios que patrocinan el ministerio. Se hacen ventas, radio maratones, conciertos, campañas, entre otros ministerios que comparten la visión misionera de la red de Radio Visión. El staff se compone de hermanos y hermanas voluntarios dedicados a la causa del ministerio para la Gloria de Dios.

name: Love FM Belize
description: 1993’s Valentine’s Day saw the birth of a private radio station that would propel into a nationwide entity providing Belize and listeners overseas with an in-depth coverage of current events

name: Radio Restauracion De Vida
description: Radio Restauracion de vida es una organización no lucrativa dedicada a predicar el mensaje de salvación a las naciones

name: Vogue Play | Belize
description: Your Most Wanted Hit-List Music Station. Non Stop Music, Just For You.
